column.description: String specifying name of data column to scale colors by

palette.description: (optional) A function describing the color palette to use forcolor scaling

range.description: (optional) A numeric vector specifying the range of values toapply a color scale to

scalePerRegion.description: A logical value indicating whether to adjustNULL range of numerical `colorby` values to subset of data in a plottedgenomic region
